attributes.action: Tougher sentencing for sex abusers and more help and support for victims and survivors
attributes.additional_details: To provide new tougher sentencing for criminals that carry out any form of abuse, ie mainly -sexual (rape). It's a lifetime sentence for a victim (survivor), punishments should reflect the devastation that any of these terrible crimes cause. A change in this must be done. Much better support and facilities are desperately needed for victims of these awful crimes. There is not enough.
